english.hero_title: Empowering Indian Farmers with Smart Agriculture Tools
english.hero_description: AgroSarthi is a smart farming assistant built for Indian farmers. It offers crop predictions, disease detection, yield estimation, and more ‚Äî all customized for your location.
english.feature_crop_desc: Get AI-powered recommendations on which crops to plant based on soil, climate, and market conditions.
english.feature_disease_desc: Upload images of plant leaves to instantly identify diseases and get treatment advice.
english.feature_weather_desc: Access hyperlocal weather forecasts and receive alerts for adverse conditions.
english.feature_price_desc: Predict future crop prices using historical data and market trends to maximize profits.
english.feature_yield_desc: Estimate your harvest yield based on current conditions and farming practices.
english.feature_call_desc: Ask agricultural doubts anytime through a voice call in your preferred language whenever necessary.
english.footer_about: AgroSarthi is a smart agriculture platform designed to empower Indian farmers with cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights.
english.crop_hero_title: Get the Best Crops for Your Land
english.crop_hero_description: Based on your region's soil, rainfall, and weather data, AgroSarthi recommends crops with the highest chance of success.
english.weather_subtitle: Get detailed weather information for your location
english.forecast_subtext: Get detailed weather information for your current location
english.price_hero_subtitle: Get price trends and estimates based on your region, crop type, and market data
english.yield_cta_text: Want to calculate your potential harvest yield? Use our yield prediction tool to get accurate estimates.
english.price_error_message: No data found for the selected parameters. Try a different combination.
english.disease_hero_description: Capture or upload a leaf image ‚Äì AgroSarthi detects issues and suggests treatments.
english.disease_upload_title: Upload or Take a Leaf Photo
english.disease_results_desc: Here's what we found in your leaf image
english.chatbot_hero_subtitle: Ask anything about farming, crops, weather, diseases, or get help with your schedule.
english.chatbot_chip_disease: How to treat leaf spot disease?
english.chatbot_welcome: Welcome to AgroSarthi Assistant! How can I help you today? üå± Ask me anything or use the quick actions below.
english.chatbot_greeting: Hello there! How can I assist you today? üòä
english.chatbot_farewell: Goodbye! Have a productive day on the farm! üëã
english.chatbot_assist_prompt: How can I assist you further?
english.chatbot_response_default: I'm sorry, I'm still learning. Could you please rephrase or try a quick action?
english.chatbot_response_recommend_crop: To give you the best crop recommendation, I need a bit more information about your soil and location. You can also use our dedicated
english.chatbot_response_weather_forecast: The forecast is mostly sunny with a gentle breeze. Perfect for field work! ‚òÄÔ∏è
english.chatbot_response_weather_no_location: I couldn't get your current location.
english.chatbot_prompt_weather_manual_location: Could you please tell me your city or district?
english.chatbot_response_crop_schedule: Here's a general crop schedule for this season:
english.chatbot_response_treat_disease: For leaf spot, ensure good air circulation and consider a copper-based fungicide. For a more accurate diagnosis, please use our
english.chatbot_prompt_disease_symptoms: Can you describe the symptoms or upload an image there?
english.chatbot_response_report_scam: Thank you for reporting. To help us investigate, please provide the phone number or details of the scam call.
english.chatbot_prompt_scam_number: What was the number or message?
english.chatbot_help_message: You can ask me about crop recommendations, weather, disease treatment, your crop schedule, or report scam calls. Try one of the quick actions too!
english.chatbot_voice_unavailable: Voice input is currently under development. Please type your message.
english.feature_chatbot_desc: Chat with our AI assistant for farming advice, weather updates, and more.
english.yield_hero_subtitle: Get an estimate of your farm's output using area, region, and crop type
english.yield_error_message: Unable to predict yield for the selected parameters. Please try different values.
english.yield_cta_text: Want to calculate your potential harvest yield? Use our yield prediction tool to get accurate estimates.
english.schedule_hero_subtitle: Follow the timeline from land prep to harvest ‚Äì customized for your crop

english.schedule_reminder_title: Stay Updated with Voice Call Reminders
english.schedule_reminder_desc: Get timely voice call alerts before each farming activity
english.schedule_success_msg: Reminders set successfully! You will receive voice calls before each farming activity.
